name: Beam It
description:
Beam It revovles around a unique game mechanic where you control two squares. By changing the position of these squares, you change the width of your 'beam.'  This changes the amount of points you get for beaming incoming squares. 

You can play it safe with a thin beam, or play high risk - high reward with a thick beam. 

Be carefull! Missing squares deducts points!

You can unlock up to 10 achievments by completing certain tasks within the game.

The game includes toggleable music and sound effects.

Your data will save between games.
